description: Fetch the Wikipedia article for Technological Singularity, summarize it with the LLM, and write the summary to tmp/summary.md

steps.text: Summarize fetched contents with the LLM

args.input:
The web_fetch tool returned the following JSON payload (string): ${A.last_payload}

Please extract the article markdown or main text from that payload and produce the requested summary.
args.instruction: Produce a concise, well-structured summary in Markdown of the provided article content. Focus on definition, history, main arguments, critical perspectives, and notable authors/works. Keep the summary concise (approx. 300-600 words). Output only the summary in Markdown format.

steps.text: Write the LLM summary to tmp/summary.md
